trans-unit.source: 0600 is what mine is set at (and it's working)
trans-unit.target: 0600是我的设定值(而且还能正常工作。

trans-unit.source: 600 for the keyfile "id_rsa"
trans-unit.target: 密钥文件 "id_rsa "为600。

trans-unit.source: 700 for the hidden directory ".ssh" where key file is located
trans-unit.target: 700为密钥文件所在的隐藏目录".ssh"。

trans-unit.source: 600 appears to be fine as well (in fact better in most cases, because you don't need to change file permissions later to edit it).
trans-unit.target: 600似乎也很好（实际上，在大多数情况下更好，因为您以后无需更改文件权限即可对其进行编辑）。

trans-unit.source: Windows 10 ssh into Ubuntu EC2 “permissions are too open” error on AWS
trans-unit.target: Windows 10 SSH进入AWS的Ubuntu EC2“权限太开放”错误

trans-unit.source: chmod 755 privateKey [dev]$ ssh -i privateKey user@ip it was giving below issue: Permissions 0755 for 'privateKey' are too open. It is required that your private key files are NOT accessible by others. This private key will be ignored. Load key "privateKey": bad permissions
trans-unit.target: chmod 755 privateKey [dev] $ ssh -i privateKey user @ ip 它给出了以下问题：'privateKey'的0755权限太开放了。要求他人不能访问您的私钥文件。此私钥将被忽略。加载密钥“ privateKey”：权限错误

trans-unit.source: AFAIK the values are:
trans-unit.target: AFAIK的数值是:

trans-unit.source: But now when I want to commit a repository I get the following error from ssh:
trans-unit.target: 但现在当我想提交一个仓库时,我从ssh得到以下错误。

trans-unit.source: Change this using the cmd:
trans-unit.target: 使用cmd改变这一点。

trans-unit.source: Convert Inherited Permissions Into Explicit Permissions
trans-unit.target: 将继承权限转换为明确权限

trans-unit.source: Could then connect securely.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以安全地连接起来。

trans-unit.source: Disable inheritance
trans-unit.target: 禁止继承

trans-unit.source: File Settings > Security > Advanced
trans-unit.target: <font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">文件设置>安全性>高级</font></font>

trans-unit.source: For me (using the Ubuntu Subsystem for Windows) the error message changed to:
trans-unit.target: 对我来说(使用Windows的Ubuntu子系统),错误信息变成了。

trans-unit.source: GID 545 is a special ID that always refers to the 'Users' group, even if you locale uses a different word for Users.
trans-unit.target: GID 545是一个特殊的ID，即使您的语言环境为Users使用了不同的单词，它也始终引用“用户”组。

trans-unit.source: Hope it help
trans-unit.target: 希望对你有帮助

trans-unit.source: I am using VPC on EC2 and was getting the same error messages. I noticed I was using the public DNS. I changed that to the private DNS and vola!! it worked...
trans-unit.target: 我在EC2上使用VPC,也收到了同样的错误信息。我注意到我使用的是公共DNS。

trans-unit.source: I believe this will work with any permissions in the set "0xx0" but I haven't tested every combination with every version. I have tried 0660 with 5.3p1-84 on CentOS 6, and the group not the primary group of the user but a secondary group, and it works fine.
trans-unit.target: 我相信这在设置 "0xx0 "中的任何权限都能正常工作,但我没有测试过每个版本的每个组合。我在CentOS 6上用5.3p1-84试过0660,组不是用户的主组,而是副组,效果很好。

trans-unit.source: I got same issue after migration from another mac. And it blocked to connect github by my key.
trans-unit.target: 我从另一个mac迁移后,也遇到了同样的问题。而且它阻止了我的密钥连接github。

trans-unit.source: I had a problem with my mac where I couldn't save any kind of file on the disk anymore. I had to reboot OSX lion and reset the permissions on files and acls.
trans-unit.target: 我的mac出现了一个问题,我的mac无法在磁盘上保存任何类型的文件了。我不得不重启OSX Lion,重新设置文件和acls的权限。

trans-unit.source: I had this issue trying to ssh into an Ubuntu EC2 instance using the .pem file from AWS.
trans-unit.target: 我在尝试使用AWS的.pem文件登录Ubuntu EC2实例时遇到这个问题。

trans-unit.source: I have came across with this error while I was playing with Ansible. I have changed the permissions of the private key to 600 in order to solve this problem. And it worked!
trans-unit.target: 在与Ansible玩耍时遇到了这个错误。我已将私钥的权限更改为600，以解决此问题。而且有效！

trans-unit.source: I reset permission as below and it works well now.
trans-unit.target: 我在下面重设了权限,现在效果不错。

trans-unit.source: I tried 600 level of permission for my private key and it worked for me. chmod 600 privateKey [dev]$ ssh -i privateKey user@ip worked
trans-unit.target: 我为私钥尝试了600级权限，它对我有用。 chmod 600 privateKey [dev] $ ssh -i privateKey user @ ip正常工作

trans-unit.source: I've got the error in my windows 10 so I set permission as the following and it works.
trans-unit.target: 我在我的windows 10中出现了这个错误,所以我把权限设置为下面的权限,就可以了。

trans-unit.source: If Keys need to be read-writable by you:
trans-unit.target: 如果钥匙需要由你来读懂。

trans-unit.source: In details, remove other users/groups until it has only 'SYSTEM' and 'Administrators'. Then add your windows login into it with Read permission only.
trans-unit.target: 详细来说,删除其他用户组,直到它只有'系统'和'管理员'。然后添加你的windows登录到其中,仅有读取权限。

trans-unit.source: In windows this worked when I put this key in a created under the .ssh folder
trans-unit.target: 在windows系统中,当我把这个键放在.ssh文件夹下创建的文件夹中时,这个键就起作用了。

trans-unit.source: Interesting message here. Operating Systems are smart enough to deny remote connections if your private key is too open. It understands the risk where permissions for id_rsa is wide open (read, is editable by anyone).
trans-unit.target: 这里有一个有趣的信息。操作系统足够聪明,如果你的私钥太过开放,操作系统会拒绝远程连接。它明白在id_rsa的权限开放的地方(读取,是任何人都可以编辑的)的风险。

trans-unit.source: Keys need to be only readable by you:
trans-unit.target: 钥匙只需要由你来读就可以了。

trans-unit.source: Note the id_rsa file is under the c:\users\<username> folder.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， id_rsa 文件位于 c:\users\<username> 文件夹下。

trans-unit.source: On Windows 10, cygwin's chmod and chgrp weren't enough for me. I had to right click on the file -> Properties -> Security (tab) and remove all users and groups except for my active user.
trans-unit.target: <font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">在Windows 10上，cygwin的chmod和chgrp对我来说还不够。</font><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">我必须右键单击文件->属性->安全性（选项卡），然后删除除活动用户之外的所有用户和组。</font></font>

trans-unit.source: Ref: http://vineetgupta.com/blog/cygwin-permissions-bug-on-windows-8
trans-unit.target: 参考：http : //vineetgupta.com/blog/cygwin-permissions-bug-on-windows-8

trans-unit.source: Remove all the permission entries except for Administrators
trans-unit.target: 删除除管理员以外的所有权限条目

trans-unit.source: Similar rules apply to the .ssh directory restrictions.
trans-unit.target: 类似的规则也适用于.ssh目录的限制。

trans-unit.source: The locale-independent solution that works on Windows 8.1 is:
trans-unit.target: 能在Windows 8.1上运行的独立于本地的解决方案是。

trans-unit.source: The relevant portion from the manpage (man ssh)
trans-unit.target: 联机帮助页中的相关部分（ man ssh ）

trans-unit.source: Then the solution posted here can be applied, 400 or 600 is OK.
trans-unit.target: 那么在这里发布的解决方案可以应用,400或者600就可以了。

trans-unit.source: There is one exception to the "0x00" permissions requirement on a key. If the key is owned by root and group-owned by a group with users in it, then it can be "0440" and any user in that group can use the key.
trans-unit.target: 密钥的 "0x00 "权限要求有一个例外。如果密钥由root拥有,并且是由一个有用户的组拥有,那么它可以是 "0440",该组中的任何用户都可以使用该密钥。

trans-unit.source: This is what worked for me (on mac)
trans-unit.target: 这就是我的工作原理(在mac上)。

trans-unit.source: This would typically not be done for someone's personal key, but for a key used for automation, in a situation where you don't want the application to be able to mess with the key.
trans-unit.target: 一般情况下,这不会是针对某人的个人钥匙,而是针对自动化用的钥匙,在你不希望应用程序能够乱动钥匙的情况下,这样做。

trans-unit.source: To change permission settings in Windows 10 :
trans-unit.target: 要更改Windows 10中的权限设置。

trans-unit.source: Using Cygwin in Windows 8.1, there is a command need to be run:
trans-unit.target: 在Windows 8.1中使用Cygwin,需要运行一个命令。

trans-unit.source: What permissions levels should i give to the id_rsa file?
trans-unit.target: 我应该给id_rsa文件什么级别的权限?

trans-unit.source: While working on the multiple servers (non-production), most of us feel need to connect remote server with ssh. A good idea is to have a piece of application level code (may be java using jsch) to create ssh trusts between servers. This way connection will be password-less. Incase, perl is installed - one may use net ssh module too.
trans-unit.target: 在多服务器(非生产型)工作时,我们大多数人都觉得需要用ssh连接远程服务器。一个好的办法是在服务器之间建立一个应用程序级别的代码(可能是java使用jsch)来创建ssh信任。这样的话,连接就不需要密码了。如果安装了perl,也可以使用net ssh模块。

trans-unit.source: after using chmod 400. It turns out that using root as a default user was the reason.
trans-unit.target: 使用chmod 400后。原来是使用root作为默认用户的原因。

trans-unit.source: chgrp Users FOLDER
trans-unit.target: chgrp用户文件夹

trans-unit.source: chgrp Users ~/.ssh/id_rsa
trans-unit.target: chgrp Users ~.sshid_rsa

trans-unit.source: chmod 600 FOLDER
trans-unit.target: chmod 600 FOLDER

trans-unit.source: chmod 600 ~/.ssh/id_rsa
trans-unit.target: chmod 600 ~.sshid_rsa

trans-unit.source: for Win10 need move your key to user's home dir for linuxlike os you need to chmod to 700 like or 600 etc.
trans-unit.target: 对于Win10系统,你需要把你的钥匙移到用户的主目录,对于linux一样的操作系统,你需要把chmod改为700或600等。

trans-unit.target: 提供400权限,执行以下命令
